forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As night wraps its cool arms around Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere is draped in a gentle layer of clouds, shadowy yet inviting, hinting at a low temperature around 57 degrees. A modest breeze, whispering from the west-southwest at about 12 mph, stitches together the coolness with the promise of dawn, setting the stage for a transition into tomorrow. The streets, washed in muted blues and grays, create a serene backdrop, where the occasional gust may nudge the foliage and send a delightful shiver through the evening air.

When Tuesday unfurls, a subtle brightness will begin to dominate the scene as the clouds part to reveal patches of blue, encouraging hopes for a day that peaks near 67 degrees before softening toward 65 in the afternoon. Beneath this sunny veneer, a playful wind dances through the city at speeds between 9 to 17 mph, punctuated by gusts that may momentarily steal your breath away. Despite the brightening skies, the iconic fog that defines this enchanting place may linger near the edges, wrapping the coastline in its poignant embrace, reminding us of the ever-evolving nature of this coastal enclave.

For those charting plans in this delightful weather, consider dressing in layers to capture the day's changing moods. A light sweater paired with a breathable jacket could be just the right touch for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or sipping coffee in a tucked-away café where sunlight filters through the windows. Engage with the world around you—the vibrant lives unfolding in the parks or the gentle hum of street musicians carving out a corner of joy amidst the bustle. Throughout this unique day, let yourself simply bask in the artistic tapestry that is San Francisco, where every moment holds a hint of magic.
